text: rick_grimes voice Dale could -- could get under your skin . He sure got under mine , because he was n't afraid to say exactly what he thought , how he felt . That kind of honesty is rare and brave . Whenever I 'd make a decision , I 'd look at Dale . He 'd be looking back at me with that look he had . We 've all seen it one time or another . I could n't always read him , but he could read us Rick 's .
voice He saw people for who they were . He knew things about us -- the truth , who we really are . In the end , he was talking about losing our humanity Rick 's .

voice He said this group was broken . The best way to honor him is to unbreak it . Set aside our differences and pull together , stop feeling sorry for ourselves and take control of our lives , our safety . Rick 's .
voice . Our future . We 're not broken . We 're gon na prove him wrong . From now on we 're gon na do it his way . That is how we honor Dale .
rick_grimes Gon na be tight 14 people in one house .
hershel_greene Do n't worry about that . With the swamp hardening , the creek drying up .
maggie_greene With 50 head of cattle on the property , we might as well be ringing a damn dinner bell .
hershel_greene She 's right . We should 've moved you in a while ago .
rick_grimes All right , let 's move the vehicles near each of the doors facing out toward the road .
lori_grimes Just leave it there .

rick_grimes We 'll build a lookout in the windmill , another in the barn loft . That should give us sightlines both sides of the property . T - Dog , you take the perimeter around the house . Keep track of everyone coming and going .
theodore_douglas What about standing guard ?
rick_grimes I need you and daryl on double duty .
theodore_douglas Gotcha .
hershel_greene I 'll stock the basement with food and water , enough that we can all survive there a few days if need be .
andrea_harrison What about patrols ?
rick_grimes Let 's get this area locked down first . After that , Shane'll assign shifts while me and daryl take randall offsite and cut him loose .
shane_walsh We 're back to that now ?
rick_grimes It was the right plan first time around . Poor execution .
shane_walsh That 's a slight understatement .
rick_grimes You do n't agree , but this is what 's happening . Swallow it . Move on .
shane_walsh You know that Dale 's death and the prisoner -- that 's two separate things , right ? You wanna take daryl as your wingman , be my guest .
rick_grimes Thank you .
shane_walsh You got it .
hershel_greene I see why you 're not taking shane with you . Just know I 've got no more patience where he 's concerned .
rick_grimes He 's turning over a new leaf . Andrea . When I 'm out with Daryl , help hershel keep an eye on things around here .
andrea_harrison Me ?
rick_grimes Shane 's got a way of letting things get out of hand , especially when he 's all torqued up .
andrea_harrison I think we 're all a bit torqued up at this point .
hershel_greene If you 're staying here permanently , he 's got to understand that it 's what rick and I say , not whatever he wants .
rick_grimes You 've become close .
andrea_harrison We talk .
rick_grimes Than you know he 's not a bad guy . He 's just his own worst enemy .
andrea_harrison You want me to babysit Shane ?
rick_grimes I need to make sure every time I leave the farm all hell does n't break loose .
andrea_harrison Then maybe you should stop leaving .
rick_grimes Will you keep an eye on things ?
andrea_harrison Of course .
carl_grimes Hey , Shane ?
shane_walsh What 's up , man ? What you doing , wandering around by yourself ?
carl_grimes If , um -- if I tell you something , will you promise not to tell my parents ?
shane_walsh I think it 's probably a bad idea for both of us , bud .
shane_walsh Hey , Carl . Come on back . Go on .
carl_grimes I took it from Daryl 's motorcycle . If he found out I took it , he 'd kill me .
shane_walsh What you doing with this ?
carl_grimes It 's my fault -- Dale . It 's my fault that he died .
shane_walsh Carl , why would you say that , man ? He got bit by a walker . Why you say-- .
carl_grimes I saw that walker . I was gon na shoot it .

carl_grimes It was stuck in the mud . I was -- I was throwing rocks at it and stuff . But I was gon na do it -- shoot it right in the head . And it -- it got free , came after me and . I ran away . If I had killed it , Dale would still be here .

shane_walsh Carl , I want you to stop that , okay ? This ai n't your fault . But you need to hold onto this . You need to protect yourself . Now look , as long as I 'm around you , nothing 's gon na happen to you , Carl . But I ca n't keep my eyes on you 24/7 only you can do that . Carl , take it .
carl_grimes I 'm never touching another gun again .
shane_walsh No , that ai n't an option , Carl , okay ?
carl_grimes Just give it back to daryl .
lori_grimes The men are in there .
maggie_greene You can put your stuff upstairs in my room .
glenn_rhee With your dad in the house ? I just -- I'm just gon na put my stuff over there .
theodore_douglas Whoa . Don't -- don't -- don't strain yourself .
lori_grimes Thank you . Rick , Carl , and I are taking the corner of the living room .
hershel_greene You can put that in my room . You 'll be more comfortable there .
lori_grimes We ca n't do that .
hershel_greene A pregnant woman and child sleeping on the floor . While I 've got a bed to myself ?
lori_grimes This is still your house .

hershel_greene It 's our home . I 'll take the couch downstairs . On nights when I come home reeking of Bourbon , my wife would lock the bedroom door . I 'm sad to say that couch and I become old friends .
theodore_douglas f you two ca n't decide , I 'll take it .
lori_grimes Thank you .
hershel_greene The couch is mine .
theodore_douglas It 's gon na get real cozy real fast in here .
lori_grimes Would n't that be easier if you waited for some help ?
shane_walsh Ai n't no use waiting for something that ai n't gon na come . No , I 'll just-- just do it all myself .
lori_grimes Yeah , you always do , just like that time you showed up rick fixing our sink .
shane_walsh Yeah . Just so you know , that 's not the reason your basement flooded . You can thank rick for that -- using rubber washers with a metal pipe .
theodore_douglas Yo , Randy . Governor called . You 're off the hook . Oh hell no .
shane_walsh Shh ! Go that way . Go on , go on . Hey .
shane_walsh Shh shh shh shh .
shane_walsh Shh shh shh shh . Hey hey , come on . Come on .

randall_culver I get it . I 'm the last face you probably want to see , huh ? Listen , I 'm gon na take up out of here , okay ? I 'm gon na get this off of you so you can breathe , but I want you to keep quiet . You listen good . Do you hear me ? Okay .

lori_grimes Please come down . So after Sophia , I -- I thought , """" we 'll figure this out . """" You know , we 'll heal somehow . After Dale ? This is real . And we ca n't . keep it at bay . It 's already got us . And it just keeps coming , does n't it ? I made a mess of things . I put you and rick at odds . I do n't even know whose baby this is . I ca n't imagine how hard that is on you . You led us out of Atlanta with no thought for yourself . Do you remember that night ? The flames , the -- and I 'm sitting your car thinking """" we 're gon na be all right . He 's gon na make it all right . We 'll get out of here . """" And I never thanked you for that . Even though things got . confused between us , you were there for me . You were there for me . Thank you .
shane_walsh You do n't need to thank me for that .
lori_grimes Of course I do . Of course I do .
shane_walsh No , you-- .
lori_grimes Whatever happened between us , whatever the hell we thought it was -- and not just you , but -- I'm sorry , Shane . Please believe me . I am so sorry .
rick_grimes Take him out to senoia -- hour there , hour back , give or take . We may lose the light , but we 'll be halfway home by then .
daryl_dixon This little pain in the ass will be a distant memory . Good riddance .
rick_grimes Carol 's putting together some provisions for him , enough to last a few days . That thing you did last night-- .
daryl_dixon Ai n't no reason you should do all the heavy lifting .
rick_grimes So are you good with all this ?
daryl_dixon I do n't see you and I trading haymakers on the side of the road . Nobody'd win that fight .
daryl_dixon I 'm gon na take a piss .
shane_walsh Hey , man , you seen carl lately ?
rick_grimes He 's inside with his mother .
shane_walsh Look , he came to me . Okay , I was n't supposed to say anything , but he was out in the swamps yesterday and he came across a walker stuck in the mud . He got scared , run off .
rick_grimes The same walker that killed Dale ?
shane_walsh That 's the one .
rick_grimes I 'll have lori talk to him .
shane_walsh Look , I think -- I think he wants to talk to his father .
rick_grimes Well , I need this randall thing done already .
shane_walsh Man , that needs to wait , okay ?
rick_grimes It 's my call .
shane_walsh How about I ride out with Daryl ? Be good for us to spend a little time together .
rick_grimes Nah , I need you here .
shane_walsh Do n't think I 'll handle it right , huh ?
rick_grimes Did n't say that .
shane_walsh What you say ? You know , your son -- he gave me this . You should get that back to Daryl , huh ? Freeing that prisoner . more important to you than carl .
glenn_rhee Andrea . Hey , did you try pumping the gas pedal ?
andrea_harrison I think it 's been parked too long .
glenn_rhee You got ta tap it three times .
andrea_harrison And give her a twist . I know , I know .
glenn_rhee Let me see .
glenn_rhee Uh , Dale told me that in these old vehicles the points get corroded .
andrea_harrison Screwdriver ?
glenn_rhee Flathead .
andrea_harrison Okay .
glenn_rhee Could you hand me a file ?
glenn_rhee I let him down .
andrea_harrison He was proud of you . Maybe not in that moment , overall .
glenn_rhee Oh , that 's easy for you to say . You had his back .
andrea_harrison I have my share of regrets , but I think that he knew how much we cared for him .
glenn_rhee That might do it .
andrea_harrison glenn .
andrea_harrison I bet it 'll work .
rick_grimes Mom said you 'd be here .
carl_grimes Told her I would stand lookout . I got tired of helping around the house .
rick_grimes Take it . What happened to Dale had nothing to do with you .
carl_grimes He -- he died , dad .

rick_grimes Yeah . Feels like there 's a lot of that going around . That 's why I need you . No more kid stuff . I wish you could have the childhood I had , but that 's not gon na happen . People are gon na die . I 'm gon na die . Mom . There 's no way you can ever be ready for it . I try to be , but I ca n't . The best we can do now is avoid it as long as we can , keep one step ahead . I wish I had something better to say , something -- something more profound . My father was good like that . But I 'm tired , son . Please take it .
shane_walsh Ah .
theodore_douglas Only got so many arrows .
daryl_dixon Is that Dale 's gun ?
theodore_douglas Yeah .
daryl_dixon Wish I knew where the hell mine is .
rick_grimes Ready ?
daryl_dixon Yeah .
theodore_douglas I 'll get the package .
rick_grimes Thanks .
randall_culver Mm - hmm , mm - hmm .
shane_walsh Do n't do nothing stupid .
shane_walsh Shh shh shh shh shh shh .
shane_walsh Hey hey , keep it quiet . Now you 're group -- you know where they 're at ?
randall_culver No , I do n't . I really -- oh !
shane_walsh Okay . Get your little ass up here . Now I 'm the only shot of you getting out of these woods alive . You hear me ? Now you start talking , boy . Where are they at ?
randall_culver We had a camp set up off the highway .
shane_walsh Okay .
randall_culver . About five miles from here .
shane_walsh Shh . Okay .
randall_culver Who knows if they 're still there ?
shane_walsh Okay . So you gon na take me to 'em ?
randall_culver Why ?
shane_walsh Because , man , I -- I'm just -- I'm done with this group , man . They doomed and I want no part of it . That 's all .
randall_culver So you 're not gon na kill me ?
shane_walsh Come on , man . If I was , you 'd be dead . Come on .

randall_culver Hey , you ai n't got ta be so rough . We 're on the same side now . You 're gon na like it with us . Gets a little crazy sometimes , but it 's a tough bunch of guys . You 'll fit in good .
shane_walsh Less talking , more walking .
randall_culver Look , I run my mouth when I get nervous . I ca n't help it . I got a lot going on , you know ?
shane_walsh It ai n't all about you .
randall_culver I -- I ai n't saying it 's about me . Just trying to-- .
lori_grimes What 's wrong ?
glenn_rhee Randall 's missing .
lori_grimes Missing ? How .
hershel_greene How long 's he been gone ?
woman What 's goin' on ?
hershel_greene It 's hard to say .
rick_grimes The cuffs are still hooked . He must 've slipped 'em .
carol_peletier Is that possible ?
andrea_harrison It is if you 've got nothing to lose .
hershel_greene The door was secured from the outside .
shane_walsh Rick ! Rick !
lori_grimes What happened ?
shane_walsh He 's armed ! He 's got my gun !
carl_grimes Are you okay ?
shane_walsh I 'm fine . Little bastard just snuck up on me . He clocked me in the face .
rick_grimes All right , Hershel , T - Dog , get everybody back in the house . Glenn , Daryl , come with us . T , I 'm gon na need that gun .
carol_peletier Just let him go . That was the plan , was n't it , to just let him go ?
rick_grimes The plan was to cut him loose far away from here , not on our front step with a gun .
carol_peletier Do n't go out there . Y'all know what can happen .
rick_grimes Get everybody back in the house . Lock all the doors and stay put !
andrea_harrison Let 's go , back in the house .
maggie_greene Okay .
shane_walsh I saw him head up through the trees that way before I blacked out . I 'm not sure how long .
rick_grimes He could n't have gotten far . He 's hobbled , exhausted .
glenn_rhee And armed .
rick_grimes So are we . Can you track him ?
daryl_dixon No , I do n't see nothing .
shane_walsh Hey , look , there ai n't no use in tracking him , okay ? He went that way . We need to pair up . We spread out , we just chase him down . That 's it .
daryl_dixon Kid weighs a buck-25 soaking wet . You trying to tell us he got the jump on you ?
shane_walsh I say a rock pretty much evens those odds , would n't you ?

rick_grimes All right , knock it off . You and glenn start heading up the right flank . Me and Shane'll take the left . Remember , Randall 's not the only threat out there . Keep an eye out for each other .
rick_grimes Looks like it 's busted pretty bad .
shane_walsh It 's fine , man . Do n't worry about me .
daryl_dixon This is pointless . You got a light ? Come on .
daryl_dixon This is pointless . You got a light ? Come on .
glenn_rhee We 're just back to square one .

daryl_dixon If you 're gon na do a thing , you might as well do it right . There 's two sets of tracks right here . shane must 've followed him a lot longer than he said . There 's fresh blood on this tree . There 's more tracks . Looks like they 're walking in tandem .
glenn_rhee Sorry .
daryl_dixon Yeah , there was a little dust up right here .
glenn_rhee What do you mean ?
daryl_dixon I mean something went down .
glenn_rhee It 's getting weird .
daryl_dixon Had a little trouble .
daryl_dixon Oh . Nice .
rick_grimes Does this way feel right ?
shane_walsh As right as any .
rick_grimes Snatched your gun , huh ?
shane_walsh Yeah . It 's my favorite piece too . Gon na wish he'd -- wish he 'd killed me when I find his sorry ass . Go on .
daryl_dixon Got his neck broke . He 's got no bites .
glenn_rhee Yeah , none you can .
daryl_dixon No , I 'm telling you he died from this .
glenn_rhee How 's that possible ?
rick_grimes You say he got you with a rock ?
shane_walsh That 's what I said .
rick_grimes Inside the shed ? 'Cause that door was shut when T - dog rolled up .
shane_walsh I saw that too . Must 've slipped through the rafters in the roof .
rick_grimes So this is where you planned to do it ?
shane_walsh It 's a good place as any .
rick_grimes At least have the balls to call this what it is-- .
rick_grimes --Murder . You really believe if you walk back onto that farm alone -- no me , no Randall-- .
shane_walsh I want you to hush up .
rick_grimes You really believe they 're gon na buy whatever bullshit story you cook up ?

shane_walsh That 's just it . It ai n't no story . I saw that prisoner shoot you down . I ran after him . I snapped his neck . It ai n't gon na be easy , but lori and Carl -- they'll get over you . They done it before . They just gon na have to .
rick_grimes Why ? Why now ? I thought we worked this all out .
shane_walsh We tried to kill each other man . What you think ? We just gon na forget about it all ? We gon na ride off into the sunset together ?

rick_grimes You 're gon na kill me in cold blood ? Screw my wife ? Have my children -- my children -- call you daddy ? Is that what you want ? That life wo n't be worth a damn . I know you . You wo n't be able to live with this .

shane_walsh What you know about what I can live with ? You got no idea what I can live with , what I live with ! You wanna talk about what I can do , Rick ? How about what you can do ? Here I am . Come on , man . Raise your gun .
rick_grimes No . No , I will not .

shane_walsh What happened , Rick ? I thought you were n't the good guy anymore . Ai n't that what you said ? Even right here , right now , you ai n't gon na fight for 'em ? I 'm a better father than you , Rick . I 'm better for lori than you , man . It 's 'cause I 'm a better man than you , Rick . 'Cause I can be here and I 'll fight for it . You come back here and you just destroy everything ! You got a broken woman . You got a weak boy . You ai n't got the first clue in how to fix it . Raise your gun .

rick_grimes You 're gon na have to kill an unarmed man . Watch my hand . Nice and easy . Easy does it . Now listen to me , Shane . There is still a way back from this . Nothing has happened here . We 're gon na lay down our guns and we 're gon na walk back to the farm together . Back to Lori . Back to Carl . Put this all behind us .
rick_grimes Shh .
rick_grimes Damn you for making me do this , Shane . This was you , not me ! You did this to us ! This was you , not me ! Not me ! Not me !
rick_grimes Son of .
carl_grimes Dad ?
rick_grimes Carl . You know . you should be back home with mom .
rick_grimes Just -- just put the -- put the gun down .
